body.name: GALAYOU WiFi Camera 2K, Indoor Home Security Cameras for Baby/Elder/Dog/Pet Camera with Phone app,24/7 SD Card Storage,Works with Alexa & Google Home G7
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 50 mins
features: 【Ultra 2K Resolution & Advanced Night Vision】Galayou wifi camera with 2K HD resolution provides you a clear and vivid image quality and captures more details on your home anywhere during day and night by using 6X digital Zoom. This indoor security camera has an enhanced night vision with effective distance up to 33 ft . This indoor camera for home security only supports 2.4GHz WiFi. ( 5GHz is not supported )

【24/7 Real-Time Motion Alert & Smart Siren】 The baby camera supports motion detection and push alert to monitor your baby/pet/elder. When your baby is climbing out of the cribs or your pet is scratching the sofa, Galayou baby camera monitor will send alert message on your phone to let you know.

【Remote Monitoring & Two-Way Audio】 Built-in microphone and speaker allows you to keep in touch with your baby, pet,family by remotely controlling the Wansview Cloud APP when you are out or busy. This WiFi camera for home surveillance also can scare away the unexpected intruder to keep your property safe with audio feature.

【Secure Local Storage & Cloud Storage 】 24/7 continuous recording feature is open to all Galayou customers without extra fees. Glayou indoor camera supports up to 128GB mciro SD card （not included) to store the vidoe clips on local storage. The Cloud storage also is a good option for the user who don't want to take the risk of losing card and card damaged. All recorded videos will be fully protected and encrypted with AWS Cloud.

【Works with Alexa& Google Home】 The security camera is compatible with Alexa and Google home. Just use the voice command to control these devices to show you the live-feed of camera. The smart integration between the Galayou camera and your device make your home system more intelligent and reliable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2K Resolution Galayou WiFi Indoor camera G7 is fully upgraded to 3 million pixels, up to 2304 × 1296 resolution, which gives the viewer a more vivid and vicarious viewing experience. Two-way Audio Galayou smart home security camera is equipped with a built-in speaker and mcirophone to allow you communicating with your loved ones. Compact & Flexible Small in size and widely used. Clear Night Vision 6pcs 940nm infrared LEDs ensure a night vision up to 33ft, you can check your baby/pet from the clear live-feed page even in darkness. Privacy Protection Turn the camera off or cover a part of the house -- two privacy modes for your choice.
Motion Sensor The dog camera will send instant alerts when detects motions so you can identify the events quickly.

Previous page Motion Triggered Siren Security camera will detect and sound a loud alarm when there is a stranger sneaks into your house. Compatible with Alexa & Google home Use voice contro and integrate the camera into other smart devices like Alexa and Google Home. SD Card & Cloud Storage SD card (Micro SD, not included) and cloud storage for your choice. 24/7 Recording Don't miss any important activities. Share the camera with your family Enjoy the peace and love with your family members. Next page 1 Siren 2 Compatible with Alexa 3 Optional Storage 4 24/7 Recording 5 Share with Family

Are they battery cameras? No. They are powered by the Type-C cable. Does it connect to the 5ghz wifi? No. It only connects with 2.4ghz wifi. You can check if the router supports 2.4ghz wifi first. Do I have to pay the cloud service? No. The cloud service is optional and can be replaced by SD card (not included). The motion alert function is free to use. What if I can't connect the camera? Firstly, please confirm you have turned on 2.4ghz wifi. Then please ensure the indicator light is flashing blue twice (which means the camera is ready for connection) before you scan the QR code. What if a SD card is inserted but not recognized? If you insert a SD card but no memory card storage function, you can format the card to FAT 32; try another SD card; restart the camera and update its firmware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Galayou security camera.
reviews.reviewText: I never write reviews, but Can I just say I was so skeptical about buying these due to the low price and how small the camera was. We had a home security system we were ultimately paying about $90.00 a month for plus had to buy the cameras ect. totaling around $350.00 for all. I bought a pack of 4 of these for lower than $70.00 than bought another for lower than $20.00, it was the easiest set up ever and installing the app (Wansview cloud) was super easy as well. The picture is so super clear the sound is amazing and bonus I can talk to who ever is in my home wile I am away and they can clearly hear me as well. The camera is very small but captures the whole room I have put them each in. I can use my IPhone to see everything wile I am away. And bonus you do not need a subscription to do this. You can easily insert the SD card in to the camera if you chose to get them to record, but if you do not want to record there is no need for the SD card. I have installed 5 into 2 of my 3 kids rooms for baby monitoring 1 in the play room 1 in the kitchen and 1 in the Livingroom, all working beautifully. I will defiantly be buying 5 more of the outdoor Galayou home security cameras for outside of the home as well now that I no they work so well. The night vision has clear as day vision. I can not say enough this is a perfect security system/baby monitor and bonus what an excellent price!! These are simply amazing for the price and to ensure a feeling of safety. The only trouble I am having is I should be able to connect them to my Echo Show so I can use that as a screen to monitor as well but I can not seem to get them to connect to it, but I can always see the rooms on my phone through the app so not a huge deal to me. I do recommend these to anyone who 1) wants a baby monitor and you don't want to spend $200.00 or 2) just wants home security that you are not paying an arm and a leg for or pay for a monthly subscription. The cameras show the whole room, you can hear everyone in the room and talk to them as well, but bonus they are small enough to hide like nanny cams. Perfect devise. I will update when I order the outdoor security cameras and let you all no if they work just as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little cameras for easy security solution
reviews.reviewText: These cameras were purchased in order to replace a couple of Akaso (pet) cameras that I purchased a few years ago. Some of them began to fail, so I searched for a well-reviewed replacement and stumbled across these Galayou Indoor Home Security cameras. The price is ridiculously low so there isn't really much to lose.I received them quickly and it was immediately apparent that they were better sized (i.e. inconspicuous) than my previous ones. They were also quite easy to set up, taking my previous micro SD cards without much hassle. They are quickly and simply formatted via the app. The picture quality is also very impressive.Time will tell if they are reliable long-term; nevertheless, these cameras are working very well at this time.I will likely order more soon. At this price, it's kind of silly not to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Wi-Fi Cameras with Impressive Features 2k video quality.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these Wi-Fi cameras, and I must say, they exceeded my expectations in every aspect. The setup process was incredibly straightforward, and connecting them to Wi-Fi was a breeze. What impressed me the most is the outstanding video quality at 2k, providing a crystal-clear picture that captures every detail.The talk mode, complete with a microphone and speaker, adds a whole new dimension to these cameras. The ability to communicate in real-time and the inclusion of alert options significantly enhance the security features. It's reassuring to know that I can stay connected and respond promptly to any situation.Another notable feature is the option to insert a small SD card. This convenient capability allows for video recording and image storage directly on the device, providing a seamless and accessible way to manage captured footage.For in-home use and security, these cameras are a perfect choice. The built-in microphone allows for two-way communication, and the alarm feature adds an extra layer of protection. The price point was more than reasonable, and the fast shipping, coupled with excellent customer service, made the overall buying experience highly satisfactory.In conclusion, these cameras offer a comprehensive and user-friendly solution for home security. I highly recommend them for anyone looking for reliable performance, advanced features, and excellent customer support—all at an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value. Quick and EASY to set up. App support is on the ball.
reviews.reviewText: Got the 4 pack for Christmas. These were set up in minutes. And they work for free but the app is also affordable and well run. Records alerts, push notifications if you want, motion alarms, live view, 2way communication, what else could you want...
